mapper.select: select cb.id,cb.title,cb.picture,cb.content,cb.tag_id,cb.user_id,cu.nickname,cu.avatar,count(cbl.id) as likes from cc_blog cb left join cc_user cu on cb.user_id = cu.id left join cc_blog_like cbl on cbl.blog_id = cb.id ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY cb.id
select cb.*,cu.nickname,cu.avatar from cc_blog cb left join cc_user cu on cb.user_id = cu.id where cb.id = #{id}
select cb.id,cb.title,cu.nickname,cu.avatar,cb.create_time as createTime from cc_blog cb left join cc_user cu on cb.user_id = cu.id order by cu.create_time desc limit 1,5
